Problem Addressed: In the gaming community, players frequently face challenges when engaging in wagers or bets. The lack of a trusted mechanism to verify opponents' performances often results in payment disputes, impacting the overall gaming experience. GameWagrs steps in to provide a secure platform where contestants can confidently compete, assured that they will receive their winnings. And our Personal Parlay feature addresses the “burn-out” many gamers feel after hours of playing their favorite game, and only having a handful of “weapon skins” or worthless in-game currencies. Current Landscape: Traditional gaming wagers rely on trust, with players often resorting to external payment platforms like Venmo. Verifying opponents' performances requires watching live streams, creating a cumbersome process that disrupts the gaming flow. Our Solution: GameWagrs solves this problem by securing contestants' funds in an escrow account. Real-time game data from our desktop app/API determines the winner, and funds are automatically released to the victor. This innovative approach simplifies the wagering process, making it secure, transparent, and user-friendly. Behavioral Impact: Our platform transforms the behavior of gamers by offering a seamless and trustworthy environment for wagers. Users can engage confidently, knowing that payouts are guaranteed, enhancing their overall gaming experience. Revenue Model: We charge a nominal fee for each wager made on our platform, ensuring sustainable revenue while providing users with a fair and transparent gaming experience. Personal Parlay Feature: In addition to micro-tournaments, GameWagrs introduces the "Personal Parlay" feature, allowing users to challenge themselves to beat personal records. Competitive Advantage: GameWagrs distinguishes itself by leveraging a desktop app for real-time data validation, eliminating the dependency on contestant livestreams. Andrew's vision, Nico's esports expertise, and Kevan's engineering acumen drive the team toward creating a revolutionary gaming platform. Future States: GameWagrs envisions transformative outcomes, including a shift in market perception, industry recognition, increased engagement, market expansion, and a more diverse gaming ecosystem.
